name: divan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a long, comfortable seat for more than one person that has no back or arms
Majd Khaldi/500Px Plus/Getty Images /GettyImages
UK (also divan bed) a bed consisting of a mattress and a base, with no boards at either end
Spaces Images/Blend Images/GettyImages
